trans-unit.source: Represents the method that handles the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting"></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 代表處理方法<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting"></xref>事件<xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView"></xref>控制項。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control raises the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> event when a Delete button (a button with its `CommandName` property set to "Delete") is clicked, but before the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> control deletes the record.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制引發<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting>事件時刪除 按鈕 (具有按鈕其`CommandName`屬性設定為"Delete") 按下時前,<xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>控制項刪除資料錄。</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView.RowDeleting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.GridView>

trans-unit.source: This allows you to provide an event-handling method that performs a custom routine, such as canceling the delete operation, whenever this event occurs.
trans-unit.target: 這可讓您提供執行自訂的常式，例如取消刪除作業時就會發生此事件的事件處理方法。

trans-unit.source: When you create a GridViewDeleteEventHandler delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event.
trans-unit.target: 當您建立 GridViewDeleteEventHandler 委派時，您可以識別即將處理此事件的方法。

trans-unit.source: To associate the event with your event handler, add an instance of the delegate to the event.
trans-unit.target: 若要將事件與事件處理常式產生關聯，將委派的執行個體加入事件。

trans-unit.source: The event handler is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate.
trans-unit.target: 除非您移除委派，否則每當事件發生時，會呼叫事件處理常式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about event-handler delegates, see [NIB: Events and Delegates](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115).
trans-unit.target: 如需事件處理常式委派的詳細資訊，請參閱[NIB︰ 事件和委派](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d98fd58b-fa4f-4598-8378-addf4355a115)。
